short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flattens and compresses WordPress plugin files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload your wordpress plugin and this plugin will flatten the files and compress them so that you can send the entire source code over to an ai using the fewest amount of tokens
